dcterms:description: A suite of challenging visual continuous control tasks designed for reinforcement learning research, providing a standardized environment for evaluating algorithms.
dcterms:title: DeepMind Control Suite (DMC)

dcterms:creator: Tianhe Yu
Deirdre Quillen
Zhanpeng He
Ryan Julian
Avnish Narayan
Hayden Shively
Adithya Bellathur
Karol Hausman
Chelsea Finn
Sergey Levine
dcterms:description: A benchmark and evaluation framework for multi-task and meta reinforcement learning, featuring a variety of robotic manipulation tasks.
dcterms:title: Meta-world

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of trajectories collected by a single policy of medium performance, used for offline reinforcement learning.
dcterms:title: Medium Dataset (specific to tasks in DMC)

dcterms:description: A dataset containing trajectories randomly sampled from the online learning agent's replay buffer before it reaches a medium performance level.
dcterms:title: Medium-replay Dataset (specific to tasks in DMC)

dcterms:description: A dataset that includes trajectories randomly sampled throughout the online learning phase, from the beginning until convergence.
dcterms:title: Full-replay Dataset (specific to tasks in DMC)
